price: Dhugumatti nuti jecha [Qur’aana] isaaniif ifa goonee jirra, akka isaan gorfamanuuf.
arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدۡ وَصَّلۡنَا لَهُمُ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walaqad waṣṣalnā lahumu al-qawla laʿallahum yatadhakkarūna
